titles.title: For the relief of John T. Monk.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 3/22/1995--Introduced. Declares that a named individual may not be required to make premium payments for a certain National Service Life Insurance policy. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to refund certain payments already made.
